data.message: With out A united Black Africa with political, economical, and military power in the interest of the African masses at home united Black Africa and world wide to combat colonialism, over a deal gone bad, or low level war over territory, or retaliation over someone that killed a family member when in reality theses crimes would and logically will not take place when we take back
